name: Professional Pay-As-You-Use
shortDescription: A private banking experience that emphasizes convenience, quality and flexibility.
salesHighlights: Relationship services for the entire family including a dedicated relationship banker, 24/7 call & email support and access to lending, invest and financial planning specialists

Professional (Platimum Greenbacks) cheque card - contactless enabled. Dual issued with Amex and Visa Signature to ensure wide acceptance as well as to ensure the nest lifestyle, travel and reward benefits possible
Choose from our range of Credit Cards - additional fees apply
Overdraft facility available - additional fees apply
Online banking subscription (subscription fee applies) / Money™ App
Greenbacks rewards subscription - additional fees apply
Unlimited access to Bidvest domestic / international departure lounges via your Professional Cheque Card, when leaving SA
4 free visits to Bidvest domestic / international departure lounges for kids on active Nedbank 4me or Unlocked.me Student accounts
Benefits as per the specific credit card chosen
Your household automatically qualifies to experience your relationship services
Travel insurance is specific to your chosen Credit Card. See Professional (Platinum Greenbacks) Credit Card as travel insurance is
Free forex delivery (foreign cash & travel card) at preferenial rates
100% loans for properties less than R5 million at tailored rates
Quick vehicle finance credit decisions via your relationship banker
Platinum investment products at exclusive rates. Direct access to Treasury for investments greater than R250,000
Free will drafting. Access to holistic estate & retirement planning
valueAddedServices: Greenbacks (Get rewarded for your everyday spend)
Contactless-enabled cards (tap your card and pay)

productFeatures.name: Income
productFeatures.description: No minimum income is required however, this offering is ideally suited to those earning over R750 000 per year.

productFeatures.name: AirtimewithoutAirtime
productFeatures.description: Airtime without Airtime (purchase airtime without having airtime using *130*001#)

productFeatures.name: SendiMali
productFeatures.description: Send i-Mali (Send money to a cellphone number using *120*001#)

productFeatures.name: Chargecard
productFeatures.description: American Express® Platinum Charge Card available at an annual fee

productFeatures.name: Internationalairportloungeaccess
productFeatures.description: Ten visits per annum. One guest per visit

productFeatures.name: Domesticairportloungeaccess
productFeatures.description: Unlimited access to Bidvest domestic and international lounges

productFeatures.name: Forexdelivery
productFeatures.description: Free forex delivery (foreign cash & travel card) at preferential rates

productFeatures.name: Insurance
productFeatures.description: Travel insurance included when paying with your Professional Banking Credit Card.

productFeatures.name: Tailoredfinancing
productFeatures.description: Tailored financing: 100% loans for home loan applications of less than R5 million and 100% loans **Quick vehicle finance credit decisions via your relationship banker. All credit applications are subject to final credit approval and terms and conditions.
